turkish_example_sentence: Biz dün gece o gürültülü partideki olmamış olsaydık, bugün yorgun hissetmezdik
english_example_sentence: If we had not been at that noisy party last night, we would not feel tired today
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не были на той шумной вечеринке прошлой ночью, мы бы не чувствовали себя уставшими сегодня
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz dün gece o gürültülü partideki ______, bugün yorgun hissetmezdik
